clinical_study.brief_title: Pain, Function and Quality of Life Before and After Treatment of Hamstring Avulsion
clinical_study.official_title: Pain, Function and Quality of Life Before and After Treatment of Hamstring Avulsion

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the study is to investigate pain, function and quality of life before and 10-12 months after surgical repair and/or rehabilitation of hamstrings avulsion

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from before surgery to 10-12 months after surgery on the 0-100 scale.
primary_outcome.description: Overall tool and pain subscale during sitting, steps and relaxing separately extracted. 0 indicates total problems and 100 no problems.

primary_outcome.measure: Knee flexion strength of affected leg (Newton meters per kilogram)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from before surgery to 10-12 months after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Maximal knee flexion strength of affected leg expressed as newton meters per kilogram, measured with a handheld dynamometer

primary_outcome.measure: Hip extension strength of affected leg (Newton meters per kilogram)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from before surgery to 10-12 months after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Maximal hip extension strength of affected leg expressed as newton meters per kilogram, measured with a handheld dynamometer

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from before surgery to 10-12 months after surgery on the 0-100 scale
primary_outcome.description: 0-100 continuous scale (0 worst imaginable health, 100 best imaginable health)

secondary_outcome.measure: Knee flexion strength of contralateral leg (Newton meters per kilogram)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from before surgery to 10-12 months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Maximal knee flexion strength of contralateral leg expressed as newton meters per kilogram, measured with a handheld dynamometer

secondary_outcome.measure: Hip extension strength of contralateral leg (Newton meters per kilogram)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from before surgery to 10-12 months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Maximal hip extension strength of contralateral leg expressed as newton meters per kilogram, measured with a handheld dynamometer

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from before surgery to 10-12 months after surgery on the 0-8 scale
secondary_outcome.description: Type of activity before injury and present 0, no activity, 8 athlete level.

intervention.description: The avulsion is repaired and hereafter the patient follows rehabilitation. Some are treated conservatively and only follow rehabilitation.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients eligible for treatment of hamstring avulsion
Exclusion Criteria:
- Conditions that contraindicate muscle strength testing e.g. cancer and neurological conditions
- Patients that do not speak or understand Danish
